rows.label: tev000592_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is so embarrassing, [ST:playername ].
I'm sorry you had to see me like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0002
rows.name:
Remember when I told you about that assignment of
setting up a data probe in Oblivia with my Pathfinder
buddy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: tev000592_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you remember.

rows.label: tev000592_JNK0020
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: tev000592_SEL0021
rows.name: Admit that you forgot the details.

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0003
rows.name: Really? Oh. That's a bit...sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0004
rows.name:
Anyway, I asked for your advice because I was uneasy
about how no one on the job had much experience,
and Oblivia seemed pretty dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, we managed to get the data probe installed
without too much trouble, which was good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0006
rows.name:
But on the way back, we were attacked by a pack of
grexes. ...Which is bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0007
rows.name:
And because I failed to clear the area properly, one of
my teammates ended up with a pretty nasty wound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0008
rows.name:
So I've been training here, in secret, to make sure I
never screw up like that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_JNK0030
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: tev000592_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Gwin he's not training hard enough.

rows.label: tev000592_JNK0040
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev000592_SEL0041
rows.name: Try to convince Gwin that he's a good fighter.

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0009
rows.name: Hey, that's not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, hell. You're right. You'd never find convenient
cover like this outside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0011
rows.name:
I need to be able to respond adequately in any
situation, no matter how unfavorable the terrain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0012
rows.name:
Maybe it's time to rethink my entire training regimen
and figure out just what I'm trying to achieve here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0013
rows.name:
All right, I'm heading back to the admin. district to
figure out a new plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0014
rows.name:
But if you ever want my help with a mission,
I'll drop what I'm doing in a heartbeat, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0015
rows.name:
Wow, really? Thanks, [ST:playername ].
Coming from you, that means a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0016
rows.name:
But I'm not just beating myself up for the heck of it.
I screwed up, and my friend suffered for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0017
rows.name:
I know that I've got a long way to go before I'm
anywhere near Irina's leagueâ€”or yours for that
matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0018
rows.name: So I don't want you treating me with kid gloves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0019
rows.name:
If I ever manage to become a decent Interceptor who's
strong enough to protect BLADEs like you and Irina,
then you can praise me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000592_MSG0020
rows.name: But not until then.[ST:wait ]
